text: Nils John Nilsson (February 6, 1933 - April 23, 2019) was an American computer scientist. He was one of the founding researchers in the ideas of artificial intelligence. He was born in Saginaw, Michigan. He was the first Kumagai Professor of Engineering in computer science at Stanford University from 1991 until his retirement. His best known work was Shakey the robot. Nilsson died on April 23, 2019, at his home in Medford, Oregon, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *Nilsson's home page Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American computer scientists Category:Engineers from Michigan Category:Stanford University faculty Category:People from Saginaw, Michigan Category:Scientists from Michigan
title: Nils John Nilsson
